mapper.select: select s.*,d.* from student s join dept d on s.id = d.deptid order by s.achievement desc, s.chinese desc, s.maths desc

select s.*,d.* from student s join dept d on s.deptid = d.deptid where s.achievement >=#{achievement} and s.chinese >=#{chinese} and s.maths >=#{maths} and s.engllish >=#{english} order by s.achievement desc,s.chinese desc,s.maths desc
select s.*,d.* from student s join dept d on s.deptid = d.deptid where used = 1 order by s.achievement desc, s.chinese desc, s.maths desc
mapper.update: update student set used =0 where studentName = #{studentName} AND id=#{id}
update student set deptid=#{deptid} where studentName = #{studentName} AND id=#{id}
